sentences.pinyin: jīn rì shì xīng qī wǔ.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他计划在今日下午的会议上提出这个问题。
sentences.traditionalText: 他計劃在今日下午的會議上提出這個問題。
sentences.pinyin: tā jì huà zài jīn rì xià wǔ de huì yì shàng tí chū zhè ge wèn tí.
sentences.translation: He plans to raise this issue in today's afternoon meeting.
